Arrow: Sorry about that anyhow.

Arrow puts The Hero's head back on.

The Hero: Ow. You freak! I'm getting out of here for a while, I need a
breather.

The Hero runs out of the base.

Arrow: I hope he stays okay. Haha. Would it be bad if something happened to
him?...

> ::Aerotaur::
>     Aerotaur walks up behind Nightlight.  "Hello Arrow."  He looks down at
> Hero's head.  "I think we'll get along nicely.  Just so long as you pull
your
> weight around here, you'll be given respect.  If you respect others and
their
> feelings you will do fine here.  As for the decapitated body, don't worry
> about him.  He's like the rabid dog that followed us home and won't go
away."
